seller_name: G. ANIL KUMAR, M/s. PVNR CONSTRUCTIONS, represented by SRI. V. NARAYANA REDDY and SRI. K. RAMACHANDRA REDDY
address_2: Shankar Green Homes, Ameenpur Village (As per site)
planned_area_source: As per copy of gram panchayat plan
area_comments: As per the copy of gram panchayat plan and sale deed, the built-up area of 1,224 sft has been considered for valuation.
setback_comments: As per gram panchayat approval, all setbacks are as per permitted norms.
occupancy_comments: Based on discussions with the contact person and visual inspection, the subject property is self-occupied.
construction_comments: The property is fully constructed as per sale deed and visual inspection.
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Copy of sale deed, copy of gram panchayat plan, tax receipt, initiation form, photographic evidence
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located in Shankar Green Homes, Ameenpur Village. 
• As per the copy of sale deed and gram panchayat plan, the land area for the subject property is 1,656 sq ft and the built-up area is 1,224 sq ft. 
• The property is a ground plus one floor structure with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 hall, 1 kitchen, and 1 other room as per blueprint and site inspection. 
• The 'comparable method' of valuation has been adopted based on registered sale deeds of nearby properties.
• Amenities, if any, are not explicitly stated in the documents provided. 
• Property plot is properly demarcated and easily identifiable as per documents and photographs. 
• No significant deviations in plot area, setbacks, or building height were observed. 
• The property is not within a protected/regulated area. 
• The expected future physical life of the property is considered to be 52 years based on visual inspection. 
• It is assumed that the subject property has a clear title and all necessary approvals and permissions have been duly obtained.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 10 June 2024 is INR 1,776,800/- [One Million Seven Hundred Seventy-Six Thousand Eight Hundred Rupees] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
